nodes.text: Chandrilan raava was an alcoholic beverage from the planet Chandrila that was consumable by humans. Around 5 ABY, former Imperial loyalty officer Sinjir Rath Velus drank it the night before he intended to rescue bounty hunter Jas Emari from the planet Jakku. He recounted to his colleague Temmin Wexley that he had not slept that night, but instead read a book and drank Chandrilan raava, since he was out of rum.
Chandrilan raava was mentioned in Aftermath: Empire's End, a 2017 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
